name: Deeply Rooted Elements
description:
Casting Stormstrike has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance

Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 985 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.
